s: ECO-FRIENDLY DURAWOOD: Durawood is a 3/4"-1" thick lumber, compared to 1/2" thick offered by our competitors, thats made from densely compressed recycled plastic milk jugs and soda bottles. It contains no waste-wood fiber so it wont absorb any water and wont rot, splinter or crack.
